introduction: I am excited to apply for the Fullstack Software Engineer position at Gemini's Nifty Gateway team. With my 4 yesrs experience in Web3 product development and a passion for crafting secure and user-centric applications, I am eager to contribute to your mission of unlocking the next era of financial and creative freedom.

projects.title: NFT Platform Development
projects.description: Designed and implemented a 3D NFT platform for a company's anniversary, supporting the minting and transfer of digital assets. To enhance user experience, I proposed and integrated Three.js, enabling immersive 3D visualization that received highly positive user feedback (96% satisfaction rate).

projects.title: Asset-Backed Tokenization
projects.description: Played a key role in building an Ethereum-based platform for tokenizing real-world assets. Developed a custom wallet app and a platform-specific custodial wallet, ensuring secure transactions and seamless integration with blockchain networks.

projects.title: Blockchain Based Paperless Trade Platform
projects.description: Spearheaded the creation of a blockchain based paperless trade platform, integrating React.js and Web3 API to ensure tamper-proof records, securing a 20M CNY grant from the Shenzhen Government.

skills: Beyond technical expertise, I bring a deep understanding of Web3 ecosystems, having contributed to projects spanning public and consortium blockchains, including collaborations with national blockchain networks like BSN. My hands-on experience with technologies such as React, TypeScript, Solidity, and AWS equips me to tackle challenges across the full stack while maintaining a strong focus on scalability and security.
missionStatement: Geminiâ€™s commitment to empowering artists and communities through NFTs resonates deeply with me. I am excited about the opportunity to leverage my skills to drive innovation and create extraordinary user experiences on Nifty Gateway.
closing: Thank you for considering my application. I would welcome the opportunity to discuss how I can contribute to your team.
